alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Cameron; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg; Kenedy; Starr; Willacy; Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued December 20 at 4:11PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE TEXAS DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY. THIS IS A STATEWIDE CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK THE PRINCETON POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR ZAINAB ALI, ASIAN, FEMALE, 16 YEARS OLD, 5 FEET 6 INCHES TALL, 130 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING BLACK LONG-SLEEVE SHIRT, BLACK PANTS, AND WHITE SHOES. UMAR ALI, ASIAN MALE, 5 YEARS OLD, 3 FEET 8 INCHES TALL, 130 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, AND BROWN EYES LAST SEEN WEARING BLACK AND WHITE JACKET, DARK T-SHIRT, BLACK PANTS AND WHITE SHOES. AYESHA ALI, ASIAN FEMALE, 8 YEARS OLD, 3 FEET 10 INCHES TALL, 70 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, AND BROWN EYES LAST SEEN WEARING A BLACK JACKET, BLACK SHIRT, DARK PURPLE LEGGINGS, AND BLACK AND WHITE SHOES. POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR NAZIA ALI, 37 YEARS OLD, ASIAN, FEMALE, 5 FEET 5 INCHES TALL, 210 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES AND UNKNOWN CLOTHING, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A BLACK, 2017, MERCEDES-BENZ, G L C 300 S U V BEARING TX LICENSE PLATE NUMBER N B V 5 3 3 4. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN PRINCETON, TX. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THESE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE PRINCETON POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 1 4 2 7 1 5 4 9 2. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS PRINCETON POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 9 7 2 7 3 6 2 4 1 6.
